weather-underground.template:
{{itemValue('Weather_Condition0')}}

{{'%.1f' | sprintf:itemValue('Weather_Temperature')}} °C

{{itemValue('Weather_Humidity')}} %
{{itemValue('Weather_Wind_Speed')}} km/h
{{itemValue('Weather_Temperature_Feel')}} °C
{{itemValue('Weather_ObservationTime') | date: 'H:MM'}}

{{itemValue('Weather_Forecast_Time0') | date:'EEEE'}}

{{itemValue('Weather_Condition0')}}

{{'%.0f' | sprintf:itemValue('Weather_Temp_Max0')}} / {{'%.0f' | sprintf:itemValue('Weather_Temp_Min0')}} °C

{{itemValue('Weather_Forecast_Time1') | date:'EEEE'}}

{{itemValue('Weather_Condition1')}}

{{'%.0f' | sprintf:itemValue('Weather_Temp_Max1')}} / {{'%.0f' | sprintf:itemValue('Weather_Temp_Min1')}} °C

{{itemValue('Weather_Forecast_Time2') | date:'EEEE'}}

{{itemValue('Weather_Condition2')}}

{{'%.0f' | sprintf:itemValue('Weather_Temp_Max2')}} / {{'%.0f' | sprintf:itemValue('Weather_Temp_Min2')}} °C

{{itemValue('Weather_Forecast_Time3') | date:'EEEE'}}

{{itemValue('Weather_Condition3')}}

{{'%.0f' | sprintf:itemValue('Weather_Temp_Max3')}} / {{'%.0f' | sprintf:itemValue('Weather_Temp_Min3')}} °C
weather-underground.name: Weather Underground
weather-underground.author: Bastiaan van Haastrecht
weather-underground.description: Local Weather, use with Weather Underground binding OH2-SNAPSHOT 2.3.0 from build 1212 - https://github.com/BasvanH

yahoo-weather.template:
Renfrew

{{itemValue('Condition')}}

{{'%.1f' | sprintf:itemValue('Temperature')}} °C

{{itemValue('Humidity')}} %

{{itemValue('Wind_Speed')}} km/h

{{itemValue('Temp_Feel')}} °C


{{itemValue('ObservationTime0') | date:'EEEE'}}

{{itemValue('Condition0')}}

{{'%.0f' | sprintf:itemValue('Temp_Max0')}} / {{'%.0f' | sprintf:itemValue('Temp_Min0')}} °C

{{itemValue('ObservationTime1') | date:'EEEE'}}

{{itemValue('Condition1')}}

{{'%.0f' | sprintf:itemValue('Temp_Max1')}} / {{'%.0f' | sprintf:itemValue('Temp_Min1')}} °C

{{itemValue('ObservationTime2') | date:'EEEE'}}

{{itemValue('Condition2')}}

{{'%.0f' | sprintf:itemValue('Temp_Max2')}} / {{'%.0f' | sprintf:itemValue('Temp_Min2')}} °C

{{itemValue('ObservationTime3') | date:'EEEE'}}

{{itemValue('Condition3')}}

{{'%.0f' | sprintf:itemValue('Temp_Max3')}} / {{'%.0f' | sprintf:itemValue('Temp_Min3')}} °C
yahoo-weather.name: yahoo-weather

settings.label: Dashboard Name
settings.description: Dashboard to go when clicking on the button

dashboard-link.name: Dashboard Link
dashboard-link.author: Kuba Wolanin
dashboard-link.description: Clicking on widgets surface will move you to a given dashboard
dashboard-link.template:
<style>
  .dashboard-link {
    background: transparent;
    border: 0;
    width: 100%;
    padding: 25px 0;
    font-size: {{config.font_size}};
    outline: none;
}
</style>
<button class="dashboard-link" 
        ng-click="sendCmd(config.habpanel_item, config.dashboard_name)">
  {{config.label}}
</button>
